text: Do you have examples of FVM solutions to a multidimensional Fokker-Planck equation (for particle distributions)? If not, please help me getting me started, I will then add an example (e.g. 1D or 2D) to the docs.

elements.text: Do you have examples of FVM solutions to a multidimensional Fokker-Planck equation (for particle distributions)? If not, please help me getting me started, I will then add an example (e.g. 1D or 2D) to the docs.

text: Actually, an example with a hyperbolic equation would also be nice. Then we can take it from there. :slightly_smiling_face:
